text: {{Infobox writer |name=Chrisann Brennan|image=Chrisann Brennan in 1972 Pegasus.jpg|image_size=230px|alt=|caption=Chrisann Brennan in the 1972 edition of the Pegasus yearbook produced by Homestead High School.|birth_date=|birth_place=Dayton, Ohio, U.S.|death_place=|occupation=Painter|nationality=American|notableworks=The Bite in the Apple (memoir)|partner=Steve Jobs (1972â€“1977)|children=Lisa Brennan-Jobs|website=|portaldisp=}}Chrisann Brennan (29 September 1954) is an American painter and writer. == Works == * Brennan, Chrisann.
